title: #66: The Art of Roughhousing with Anthony T. DeBenedet
description: I talk to Dr. Anthony T. DeBenedet author of the book, The Art of Roughhousing. We discuss what the research says on the benefits of roughhousing with your kids. Basically, body slamming your kid on the bed makes him awesome.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
